string.text: NPC Deck (NPCD) - a framework for NPC RPG deck builders by Strangerism
Enable/Disable all the NPDC installed modules
Safe module uninstall. %c[d_red]BEWARE!%c[white] All perks from this module will be removed from any NPC that have them and their perk profile will be rerolled
Interval in seconds for the active feat to be available again for activation
The duration in seconds of the feat's effect

A perk can be of three types: 
- %c[orange]ARCHETYPE%c[white]: a full fledged class perk with active feats. NPCs have a chance to spawn with it and only with one. 
- %c[orange]MAIN%c[white]: a major perk with one or more feats. Might have active feat. NPCs can have at most 2 main perks. 
- %c[orange]SECONDARY%c[white]: a minor perk with a single feat, that cannot be active. NPC always have 2 secondary perks.
The perk category might detrmine which main perks an NPC can have. \n Main perks must be of the same category of the archetype perk if an NPC has one.
Chance for an NPC to spawn with this perk. The value as a percentage.

A feat can be of several types: 
- %c[orange]ACTIVE%c[white]: an active feat is activated on player command or automatically by the npc ai. It might have a cooldown and use the actionbar keybind for the activation. 
- %c[orange]PASSIVE%c[white]: a passive feat is activated by a context (game events, stances, etc). For instance opening a stash, buying from an npc, aiming with a scope, etc. 
- %c[orange]BOON%c[white]: a one-time reward/boon that is given to the npc upon rolling this perk. NPC can have only have 1 boon. 
- %c[orange]TRAIT%c[white]: a feat with both positive and negative effects. NPC can have only have 1 trait. 
- %c[orange]MUTATION%c[white]: a feat that affects another feat, mainly by changing its properties and effects.

A feat can mode can be of several types: 
- %c[orange]AUTO%c[white]: automatically activated based by the npc ai as implemented in the feat. The effect is %c[green]applied%c[white] upon activation and it has a cooldown. 
- %c[orange]MANUAL%c[white]: manually activated by the player with an input key. The effect is %c[green]applied%c[white] upon activation and it has a cooldown. 
- %c[orange]MODAL%c[white]: manually activated by the player with an input key. The effect is %c[green]applied%c[white] if the modal is on, disabled when it's off. 
- %c[orange]EVENT%c[white]: activated upon one or more in-game context occurs. The effect is %c[yellow]evaluated%c[white] following activation. 
- %c[orange]STANCE%c[white]: Stance is a special case of Event mode. Activation is available when the player enters a particular stance, and activation happens when one or more contexts occurs. The effect is %c[yellow]evaluated%c[white] only following activation and not stance entering. 
- %c[orange]CUSTOM%c[white]: A custom activation mechanism defined by the perk's implementation.
You have discovered a new perk: %c[d_cyan]%s.
